nodes.text: Ojom was a world located in the galaxy's Deep Core that was the homeworld of the Besalisk species. The chef Dexter Jettster and Jedi Master Pong Krell were both Besalisks from Ojom.

Ojom was first mentioned in "Galactic Power Brokers", a Star Wars Legends article written by J.D. Wiker and published in the tenth issue of Star Wars Gamer in 2002. It was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
